subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Broke that association!
author: Lisby
full_text:
Frank, do you mind if I ask what happened?

Ann

On Mar 25, 2007, at 10:53 PM, Frank Sumption wrote:

> Just FYI. I am no longer connected to Haunted Times in any way,  
> except Chris
> Moon can keep and use the Ghost Boxes he has, I won't be supplying  
> anymore.
> I very much dislike the concept, and activity of "ghost huning",  
> there too
> many egos, associated wiht it, to many that think they are the  
> worlds only
> paranoramal experts, and way too much focus on the negative, and  
> "scary"
> aspects.  My systems are not designed for that ....stuff, and I can't
> support those activities, even it means that I don't personaly put  
> any more
> of my boxes out there in the public. The information for making  
> this stuff
> is out there, and others can build this stuff, and do whatever they  
> want
> with it. I doubt if there will be many "Frank's Box" clones out  
> there, while
> the circuits are straight forward, it takes the "certain  
> understanding" to
> get it to work.
>
> Frank
>
